name: 鄭以旋
objective:
This course is designed for undergraduate students to develop their academic English language skills in preparation for an all-English learning environment. Students will engage actively in a variety of academic writing and speaking activities. Students will also learn general English syntax and structure of an academic essay as well as strategies for delivering a successful presentation for academic purposes.

Any inquiry please contact Ms. Chen (chihhsuanchen@mail.ntut.edu.tw) or Ms. Huang (yushanhuang@mail.ntut.edu.tw) at the Media Center.
